name: Poke Dream Catch Em All
description:
Poke Dream is a pokemon style 2.5D based platformer game in which you play as Riki. It includes collecting pokeballs & capturing ghost pokemon's which are spreading all over the city and also overcoming all other obstacles.

Its a small game so i've made it little difficult. It has pokemon theme but its very different from all the pokemon game .

If you guys would like to donate you can donate to me on paypal at aarvik20@gmail.com since itch.io paypal thing is not working for me.

Also its my first game made with godot engine.
